description: Braxton Boyd is young, handsome, and smart wunderkind who believes in getting ahead the honest way. But that doesn’t cut it in New York, and he learns if he really wants to make his way up the corporate ladder, he’s got to use some of his other assets too. Braxton’s boss, Andre Donovan, has been waiting for Braxton to understand how the business world truly works, and when he finally makes the commitment to win, he drops to his knees and sucks Andre’s big black cock before bending over and literally taking it up the ass from his boss!
title: Andre Donovan Fucks Braxton Boyd’s Ass
